item.title: Talks
item.description: Upcoming talks AGU - Dec 13th-17th 2021 Find the list of talks and posters by our team members in our latest newsletter. Newsletter Past talks Big Data 2021 Ryan Abernathey - Pangeo Forge. Video Ryan Abernathey - OceanCloud: Transforming oceanography with a new approach to data and computing. Video 2020 Ryan Abernathey - JupyterCon 2020: Cloud Native Repositories for Big Scientific Data.
